info.title: Horizon Sync ERP - User Management Service
info.description: User, Organization, Role, Team, and Subscription management

post.description:
Onboard a new organization with owner account.

This is the main signup endpoint that:
1. Creates the organization
2. Creates the owner user
3. Sets up default subscription
4. Creates default roles
5. Returns auth tokens

get.description: Get current user's profile with organization context.
List users in the current organization.

patch.description: Update a user in the organization.

delete.description: Deactivate/remove a user from the organization.

post.description: Invite a user to join the organization.
Accept an invitation to join an organization.

put.description: Update a user's role in the organization.

get.description: List all roles for the organization.

schema.title: Response List Roles Api V1 Roles Get
Response List System Roles Api V1 Roles System Get
Response List Permissions Api V1 Permissions Get

get.description: List permissions grouped by resource or module.

schema.title: Response List Permissions Grouped Api V1 Permissions Grouped Get
Response List Resource Types Api V1 Permissions Resources Get
Response List Action Types Api V1 Permissions Actions Get

get.description: List all teams in the organization.

schema.title: Response List Teams Api V1 Teams Get
Response Get Team Hierarchy Api V1 Teams Hierarchy Get

post.description: Add a member to a team.
Add multiple members to a team.

delete.description: Remove a member from a team.

get.description: Get current subscription usage vs limits.

post.description: Upgrade subscription to a higher plan.
Downgrade subscription to a lower plan.
Cancel subscription (will be downgraded to free plan).

get.description: List audit logs for the organization.
Get audit logs for a specific entity.
Get audit logs for a specific user.
